entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:34 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -35.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 10:38 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -35.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -39.7°C
Wind: WNW 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h diminishing to 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
